title: check_finish_ingest_document_command
description: Check finish ingest document command schema.

ingest_document_id.description: A unique identifier that is used to track ingest messages for a single document to keep ingest document status up-to-date.

previous_error_count.description: Number of ingest items in ERROR state at the end of previous check.

previous_success_count.description: Number of ingest items in SUCCESS state at the end of previous check.

previous_in_progress_count.description: Number of ingest items in IN_PROGRESS state at the end of previous check.

seconds_without_progress.description: Seconds counter to track the amount of time when no progress was made, no change in 3 count values. If this counter reaches 600 (10 min) - document processing is considered as failed for an unknown reason, e.g. somehow the whole process froze.
